barnKey.name: Rusty Barn Key
barnKey.description: An old iron key, rusted but still functional. Unnaturally cold to the touch.

ancestorJournal.name: Ancestor's Journal
ancestorJournal.description: A leather-bound journal from 1897 belonging to Ezekiel Miller. It details the origin of the curse and hints at how to break it.

brassCollar.name: Brass Bell Collar
brassCollar.description: A tarnished brass collar with a small bell. Rings with a pure, clear tone that seems to ward off bovine spirits.

beeVeil.name: Beekeeper's Smoke Veil
beeVeil.description: An old beekeeper's protective hood with mesh and a small smoke brazier. Still potent despite its age.

blessedHat.name: Blessed Straw Hat
blessedHat.description: A wide-brimmed hat woven from blessed straw. Feels warm and alive in your hands.

saltAmulet.name: Salt Circle Amulet
saltAmulet.description: A small amulet containing blessed salt in a glass vial. The salt glows faintly with inner light.

workGloves.name: Worn Work Gloves
workGloves.description: Sturdy leather work gloves, worn smooth by years of labor. They make you feel stronger.

magnifyingGlass.name: Magnifying Glass
magnifyingGlass.description: A brass-handled magnifying glass with a crystal-clear lens. Everything looks sharper through it.

silkNeckerchief.name: Silk Neckerchief
silkNeckerchief.description: A fine silk neckerchief in a fetching color. Makes you look more presentable.

sturdyOveralls.name: Sturdy Overalls
sturdyOveralls.description: Heavy-duty denim overalls with reinforced knees. Makes you feel ready for anything.

luckyHorseshoe.name: Lucky Horseshoe
luckyHorseshoe.description: An old iron horseshoe, supposedly blessed by a traveling priest. Your perception feels heightened.

crackedMirror.name: Cracked Hand Mirror
crackedMirror.description: A small hand mirror with a long crack across its surface, fogged with unnatural frost. A ghost was circling it when you found it.

moldyCheese.name: Moldy Cheese Wheel
moldyCheese.description: A wheel of cheese covered in greenish mold. It smells terrible and radiates wrongness.
moldyCheese.warning: This item reeks of curse magic. Best left alone.

mouserCharm.name: Mouser's Charm
mouserCharm.description: A small carved wooden cat with amber eyes. It radiates warmth and faintly purrs when held. Farm cats have always kept the mice at bay.

stickyHoneycomb.name: Sticky Honeycomb
stickyHoneycomb.description: A piece of honeycomb still dripping with honey. It buzzes softly in your hand.
stickyHoneycomb.warning: The honeycomb thrums with strange energy. Probably cursed.

smokedJerky.name: Smoked Jerky Pouch
smokedJerky.description: A leather pouch of impossibly well-preserved jerky. Each bite fills you with a stubborn, iron-willed resolve.

tarnishedCompass.name: Tarnished Compass
tarnishedCompass.description: A battered brass compass that doesn't point north. Instead, the needle swings toward whatever is most important nearby.

strawDoll.name: Straw Poppet
strawDoll.description: A crude doll woven from dried corn husks and straw, with black button eyes. Your joints ache when you hold it.
strawDoll.warning: The doll's button eyes seem to follow you. This thing is definitely cursed.

ironLantern.name: Iron Lantern
ironLantern.description: A heavy wrought-iron lantern with a flame that never quite dies. Its warm glow makes you look compelling and trustworthy.

wellWornBoots.name: Well-Worn Boots
wellWornBoots.description: Heavy leather boots worn smooth by years of farm work. They grip the earth like roots and make you feel unshakeable.

copperThimble.name: Copper Thimble
copperThimble.description: A tiny copper thimble etched with protective runes. A wave of calm confidence washes over you when you slip it on.

dustyEgg.name: Dusty Black Egg
dustyEgg.description: A small egg, cold and black as coal. Something shifts inside when you tilt it. It makes your vision swim.
dustyEgg.warning: The egg pulses with a faint heartbeat. Nothing good can come of this.

boneCharm.name: Bone Charm
boneCharm.description: A small bundle of animal bones lashed together with sinew and dried herbs. It rattles softly and smells of sage. Something about it repels the stench of decay.

strawberries.name: Fresh Strawberries
strawberries.description: A handful of impossibly perfect strawberries from the garden, still warm from the sun. They smell heavenly.

spidersilkBracelet.name: Spidersilk Bracelet
spidersilkBracelet.description: A delicate bracelet woven from impossibly fine spider silk. It shimmers faintly and feels warm against your skin, as though warding something away.

potionOfCleansing.name: Potion of Cleansing
potionOfCleansing.description: A small glass vial filled with swirling silver liquid. It glows faintly and hums with purifying energy. One sip should be enough to purge a single curse.
